metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9804 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - negligible
metadata.Description: In Firefox Developer Tools it is possible that pasting the result of the'Copy as cURL' command into a command shell on macOS will cause theexecution of unintended additional bash script commands if the URL wasmaliciously crafted. This is the result of an issue with the native versionof Bash on macOS. *Note: This issue only affects macOS. Other operatingsystems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 66.

criterions.comment: mozjs52 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
